info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 7:24PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Warren and north central Saratoga Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 723 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Luzerne-Hadley, or 10 miles southwest of Lake George Village, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glens Falls, Warrensburg, Lake George Village, Corinth, West Glens Falls, Lake Luzerne Campground, Glens Falls North, Queensbury, Lake Luzerne, Hadley, Lake George, Big Hollow, Beartown, French Mountain, Fourth Lake, Conklingville, Stony Creek Station, Oneida Corners, Paradise Beach and Lake Sunnyside. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 19 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for east central New York.
